parts.text: {"word":"speedlight","priority":"☆☆☆","meanings":[{"part_of_speech":"noun","definition":"(写真) スピードライト、クリップオンストロボ","english_definition":"A compact, portable electronic flash unit used in photography, typically mounted on a camera's hot shoe.","examples":[{"sentence":"He used a speedlight to illuminate the dark room.","translation":"彼は暗い部屋を照らすためにスピードライトを使った。"},{"sentence":"The photographer attached the speedlight to the camera's hot shoe.","translation":"写真家はスピードライトをカメラのホットシューに取り付けた。"},{"sentence":"Off-camera speedlights can create more dramatic lighting effects.","translation":"オフカメラのスピードライトは、より劇的な照明効果を生み出すことができる。"}],"collocations":["on-camera speedlight","off-camera speedlight","TTL speedlight","manual speedlight","trigger a speedlight","bounce flash with a speedlight"],"synonyms":["flash","strobe","electronic flash","hot shoe flash"],"antonyms":[],"related_words":["hot shoe","flash diffuser","flash bracket","TTL (Through-The-Lens) metering","guide number"],"usage_notes":{"explanation":"A speedlight is a type of flash commonly used in photography. It's more powerful and versatile than the built-in flash on most cameras. Speedlights can be mounted on the camera's hot shoe or used off-camera for more creative lighting. They often have features like TTL metering and adjustable power settings.","priority":"★★☆"}],"etymology":{"value":"A combination of 'speed' (referring to the short duration of the flash) and 'light'.","priority":"★☆☆"},"pronunciation":{"ipa":"/ˈspiːdˌlaɪt/","syllables":"speed-light"},"inflection":{"noun_plural":"speedlights"},"level_frequency":{"frequency_google_ngram":"Low frequency - Specialized vocabulary related to photography.","priority":"★☆☆"},"readability_explanation":{"level":"C1","text":"'Speedlight' is a technical term used in photography to describe a type of external flash unit. Understanding this term requires some familiarity with photography equipment and techniques."},"example_sentences":[{"sentence":"The professional photographer always carries multiple speedlights for different lighting scenarios.","translation":"そのプロの写真家は、さまざまな照明のシナリオに対応するために、常に複数のスピードライトを持ち歩いている。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"photography equipment"},{"sentence":"Using a speedlight with a diffuser can soften the harsh light and create more flattering portraits.","translation":"ディフューザー付きのスピードライトを使用すると、強い光を和らげ、より魅力的なポートレートを作成できる。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"photography equipment"},{"sentence":"He triggered the off-camera speedlight remotely to add a rim light to the subject.","translation":"彼は被写体にリムライトを追加するために、オフカメラのスピードライトをリモートでトリガーした。","type":"noun","meaning_category":"photography equipment"}]}
